DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial examine brief motivational intervention improve adherence exercise among individual MS improve fatigue .
DOC.brief_title: Telehealth-Based Exercise Program Treat Fatigue MS
DOC.detailed_description: This 2-arm single blind parallel group RCT compare brief telephone base motivational intervention informational control improve adherence exercise among individual MS . The primary outcome improvement fatigue .
DOC.criteria: Multiple Sclerosis Veteran receive service VA VISN 20 Fatigue Ability ambulate cell phone Household phone line Individual multiple sclerosis verify MS provider ambulatory Current alcohol dependence substance dependence No work phone
